Events.OnTargetChosen:
(block ( (targetObj (@ gData 'targetObj))
; The XP reward for the station is 1/20th the ; treasure value for the station. On average, this works ; out to the following values: ; ; LEVEL XP ; -------------------- ; 1 50 ; 2 50 ; 3 100 ; 4 100 ; 5 200 ; 6 400 ; 7 800 ; 8+ 1,000
(rewardExact (/ (obj@ targetObj 'stdTreasure) 20))
; Round it to the nearest 50
(reward (min (max 50 (* 50 (round (/ rewardExact 50)))) 1000)) ) (msnSet@ gSource 'rewardXP reward) )

Language.Text: Destroy Threat to Black Market Station

%TargetName% is interfering with our business. Your mission is to destroy the station.
System: %systemName%\n Payment: None

The dark-haired woman picks up a datapad.
"Now that I think of it, I do need a blunt instrument to take care of a problem."

"There's %targetName% in the system that's been interfering with our business. Lord Mikho would like someone to destroy it, but all our bounty hunters are busy.
"Do you think you can handle it?"
"Excellent! I will enter the coordinates into your computer. Good luck!"
The dark-haired woman frowns for a second, "I'm sorry you feel that way. I will inform Lord Mikho."

The dark-haired woman doesn't look up as you enter.
"You better not be here to ask for help."

The dark-haired woman is pleased.
"Good. I can cross that off my list. Lord Mikho will be pleased."

The dark-haired woman is disappointed.
"You are useless."
